name: 262 - Revere - Toro
additionalNotes: 262 Cigars is a brand that has been in the industry for quite some time, with its first release being the Paradigm. The name "262" is a reference to 02/1962, which marks the date on which President Kennedy signed the embargo against Cuba. The brand is characterized by its great variety of cigars and the nuances they offer which can satisfy from the most novice to the most amateur in the world of cigars.
